text: Niŵatataŵene najo ŵandu ŵakwe (pakun'jogoya kuti chatapane ligongo lyakulekangana ni isanamu). Jwalakwe jwatite: “Ana nkutataŵana none pa ya Allah kutendaga pamasile paanjongwele? Soni nganimba naijogwepe yankum'bwanganya nayo (Allah), (ngaŵa nkuumbata chilichose) ikaŵeje Ambuje ŵangu ali asachile chinechakwe (kuti chimbate), Ambuje ŵangu atenjele pa umanyilisi wakuchimanya chilichose, ana ngankukumbuchila (yangun'jamukaga ni kwamuchika)?”
